modName: Immersive First Person Combat Items Fix
summary:
Makes items that normally are invisible in First Person Combat appear as they should.
Fixes all rings mods, bracelets of all kinds, and many other unique mod items ALL of that without scripts. There is no other mod that corrects this issue in as simplistic a manner as this one does and at no performance cost.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][size=2][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/68776-0-1442020902.jpg[/img]
photo by BladeMaker547[/size]

Immersive First Person Combat "Items Fix"
[/size]by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977][u][color=#0066cc][size=4]Gamefever[/size][/color][/u][/url][size=4]
[/size][/center]
[center]A fix of crucial importance to immersion.



[size=4][u]Here is what others have had to say about this fix
[/u][/size]
[i]"*worships* I tried to use the CK to make this happen but like...yeah that wasn't working out.  THANK YOU. *hurries off to download*"  Ryuuichi009

"God this looks so cool but..does it work with skyre's races??If not can you make a file for skyre races???PLZ??? [img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/biggrin.gif[/img] " Alexanndros27

"thanks for the immersivability of this immersive mod that u hv immersively created for us who thirst for immersion.
IMMERSION FOR LIFE! YAW!"  arrifmus

[/i][size=4][b][u]

[/u][/b][/size]
[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/68776-0-1439626339.jpg[/img][/center]


[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/68776-1-1439626339.jpg[/img]
In this photo you will see a black bracelet and a silver ring on the left hand

100% compatable with first person mods.

[size=5]DawnGuard is needed in this version,
I made it compatible with PlayerVampire in mind.

This mod 100% deserves the use of "Immersive" it does its job so well that I totally forgot that I had made this thing, I've had this for over a year maybe two in my game.

If [size=3]I have to show you an image for every possible item fixed by this mod then this file would have to be rated Adult Content rather than E for Everyone.
[/size] [size=4]
[size=5][b][u]Also, it does even more!

[/u][/b][/size][size=4]-Prevents Aliens from stealing Bra's (slot 56)
-Prevents Piercings from slipping out of sight!
-Allows certain capes collars to still be seen
-Prevents quite a lot of Super Bowl Sized wardrobe Malfunctions!
-Does not contain, more stuff!  Get this fix without extra stuff like rings you don't want or fixes you didn't want!
-Play the game knowing your Custom Outfits don't epically fail in First Person today with a Gamefever 1st Person Combat Fix Today!

[/size][/size]
[/size][size=3]For Mod Nerds who know this stuff like me.
Slots activated are 40 44 50 54 56 59 60

So it uh activates items from quite a few mods and a few that some might not know about even.
